body.name: Furologee Nightstand with 2 Fabric Drawers, White Beside Table, End Table with 2-Tier Shelf, Side Table with Hooks and Wood Top for Bedroom/Living Room/Hallway/White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 18 mins
features: Nightstand With 2 Hooks: Equipped with 2 S-shaped metal hooks to add extra storage space. You can hang headphones, file folders, keys, small backpacks, hats and so on. Removable hooks can be hung on the side table or in other place.

2 Fabric Drawers: The front of the drawer is made of PVC, while the rest are made of fabric, breathable and prevent dust, make table is lightweight. Sealed drawers for storing snacks, toys and other everyday items. It is ideal for storing personal items. Drawers bottom hold up to 7 lbs.

Sturdy & Stable: This table is made of metal farme, and 2 metal rods on the side not only hang hooks, but also increase the sturdiness of the end table. 4 adjustable foot keep table stable and protect the floor. Beautiful particle board table top is simple and waterproof, wipe gently with a damp cloth and say goodbye to stains!

Ample Storage Space: The bedside table has a top shelf, open storage space and 2 large drawers. 2 tiers shelf provide ample space for phone, alarm clock, lamp, book, and coffee mug. Keep your room organized.

Decorate Your Room: Warm and retro night stands, can be used as a living room sofa side table, bedside table for bedroom, printer stand for study, hallway storage table. In addition, perfect combination with Furologee computer desk, TV stand, sofa table and bookshelf.

Worry-Free Service: Product size:14.96"D x 11.75"W x 22.25"H, manual with detailed operation instructions, the hardware and tools included and each accessory is labeled for easy installation. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit space perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this nightstand to go with the 8 drawer matching dresser (bought first). Really like the addition and my room looks great. It was really easy assembling the 2 drawers, just like its sister dresser was. My space is small (entire apt 497 square feet) so the bedroom is not overwhelmed with regular furniture store which is heavier and bulky. The two shelves are of real wood (like the dresser) and frame is steel (like the dresser). I have had great compliments about both. The chocolate brown color is gorgeous. (Comes in white for those that like the style and cost). One thing that occurred to me is that the furniture made like this is more practical if your budget is really limited. I also like the fact that it is easier to move around (used furniture sliders for carpet), and when it comes time to move to a bigger place, this and its sister dresser will be easier for me to move (lift). Quality is good and shipping was fast. I plan to add more pieces for my TV etc., and like its functionality for me. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars much smaller than it looks
reviews.reviewText: When I put them next to my bed, they look so tiny! But they are sturdy (and even though the drawers are fabric, they are very secure). If you are limited on space, these are perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice side table
reviews.reviewText: It's a bit smaller than expected, but that just made mi throw out stuff that wasn't really needed. Easy to put together, and drawers are of good size. It's durable and light to move around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pay attention to size!
reviews.reviewText: I did not read the size description and was surprised once it was built. It seems sturdy and it looks nice, just wish it would’ve been more clear about it being small for a dunce like myself 🤦🏻‍♀️ a little disappointed in size for the amount I paid for it and it being cloth shelves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to go with the same color dresser I bought, nice night stand, will do a good job holding my time clock and other stuff. Sturdy too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheaply made, small
reviews.reviewText: I’m not happy with this product looks nothing like the picture the drawers are made mesh. The rest is just cheaply made. It’s very small and short definitely should not be considered a night stand would not recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little inn table
reviews.reviewText: Cool little inn table well built not to expensive very pleased

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it!
reviews.reviewText: Nightstand - Bad Functionality.UserWrite me a bad product review about a nightstand called Furologee Nightstand highlight how it is not easy to pull in and out and you are better off investing your money into something better in 250 wordsChatGPTI recently purchased the Furologee Nightstand and was extremely disappointed with its functionality. The main issue with this nightstand is that it is not easy to pull in and out, making it a complete hassle to use on a daily basis.The drawers are poorly designed and do not slide smoothly. I found myself having to use excessive force to pull the drawers out, which often resulted in them getting stuck or jammed. This made accessing my belongings extremely frustrating, and I ended up having to switch to another nightstand altogether.Overall, I would not recommend the Furologee Nightstand to anyone. It is not worth the money or the hassle. Save yourself the trouble and invest in a better-quality nightstand that is easier to use and built to last.
